VERA UI

Alert

An alert displays a short, important message in a way that attracts the user's attention without interrupting the user's task.

Simple Alerts
The alert offers four severity levels that set a distinctive icon and color. Namely alert-success, alert-danger, alert-warning, and alert-info
error_outline This is an error alert.
report_problem This is a warning alert.
info This is an info alert.
task_alt This is a success alert.
Note: You can also ignore the icon imports/spans and get the normal text in your app!
